name: gbrewardsprogram
description: GB Rewards Program â€“ backend + frontend

scripts.install: npm run install:server && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: cd frontends/bijouxt && CI= DISABLE_ESLINT_PLUGIN=1 GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_SERVER= npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const cwd=process.cwd(); const src=path.join(cwd,'build'); const dest=path.join(cwd,'../../server/public'); fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>{ const s=path.join(src,f); const d=path.join(dest,f); if(fs.statSync(s).isDirectory()) fs.cpSync(s,d,{recursive:true}); else fs.copyFileSync(s,d); });"
